articles.author: Angela Case (KUSA)
articles.title: Mountain lion found under Boulder porch - 9News.com KUSA
articles.description: CPW said since Jan. 15, there have been 18 reports of mountain lions in the city of Boulder. They also said several pets have been taken by lions.
articles.content:
BOULDER, Colo. Wildlife officers removed and relocated a mountain lion found underneath a porch in Boulder Sunday, Colorado Parks and Wildlife (CPW) said. 
CPW said the mountain lion was under the p… [+2903 chars]

articles.title: Tom Holland dominates at the box office as Uncharted and Spider-Man land in top three - Daily Mail
articles.description: Tom Holland, 25, dominated at the weekend box office as he starred in the number one film (Uncharted) and the number three movie (Spider-Man: No Way Home).
articles.content:
Tom Holland proved he's not going anywhere over the weekend when his films Uncharted and Spider-Man: No Way Home bookended the top three.
